name: html.format.wrapLineLength
desc: Maximum amount of characters per line (0 = disable).

name: html.format.preserveNewLines
desc: Controls whether existing line breaks before elements should be preserved. Only works before elements, not inside tags or for text.

name: html.format.templating
desc: Honor django, erb, handlebars and php templating language tags.

name: html.suggest.html5
desc: Controls whether the built-in HTML language support suggests HTML5 tags, properties and values.

name: html.validate.scripts
desc: Controls whether the built-in HTML language support validates embedded scripts.

name: html.validate.styles
desc: Controls whether the built-in HTML language support validates embedded styles.

name: html.autoCreateQuotes
desc: Enable/disable auto creation of quotes for HTML attribute assignment. The type of quotes can be configured by `#html.completion.attributeDefaultValue#`.

name: html.hover.documentation
desc: Show tag and attribute documentation in hover.

name: html.hover.references
desc: Show references to MDN in hover.

name: html.mirrorCursorOnMatchingTag
desc: Enable/disable mirroring cursor on matching HTML tag.

name: html.trace.server
desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the HTML language server.
